title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: E. F.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and red watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: E. F.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Square monogram, each horizontal element of the "E" in thin horizontal lines over which is superimposed an "F" comprised of a wide vertical element and two horizontal elements in red watercolor which flank the middle branch of the "E".
Puiforcat fabrication #:

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: E. F.", ca. 1920–40.
ca. 1920–40. Pen and black ink, brush and red watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-88.
